name: Meteor Fall (lucascm)
description:
You are a dinosaur trying to escape extinction! Move left and right to avoid meteors, and press the Action button to dash in order to cover just a little more distance. See how far you can go and aim for higher scores!

You can play the game in your browser or download the provided rom to use with your emulator of choice.

This game was developped with batari Basic for the Atariando 2022 event and the source code is available here.
